EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to my voicemail message.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Per my voicemail, I wanted to send along some information about the Sunoco Fleet Card Program. I think you’ll find the Program an ideal solution for your business.
Whether you’re looking for robust fuel rebates, nationwide card acceptance, or tighter control over your company vehicles, a Sunoco Fleet Card is an extremely powerful tool in helping you more easily and cost-effectively manage your vehicles and fleet-related expenses.
The Program is designed to give you complete control over your fleet, including:
· Powerful Reporting. Know who bought what, when, where and for how much – available in hard copy and online.
· Broad Acceptance. Fuel conveniently at more than 5,000 Sunoco sites, with card acceptance at over 90% of all U.S. fueling locations with the Sunoco Universal Fleet Card. You'll also save money on every gallon of fuel at Sunoco - from gallon one - just by using your Sunoco Fleet Card.
· Purchase Controls. Help eliminate any misuse of company vehicles by setting purchase limits for each driver, with purchase alerts to keep you well informed.
· Live U.S.-based Customer Service. Award-winning customer assistance for you and your drivers 24/7.
And much more.
I am including Program information and an application for your review. The application is the first step in getting set up with a Sunoco Fleet Card. Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have. I’ll also plan to follow up with you soon.
I hope we'll have the opportunity to serve your needs.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
